tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditionally Exempt / 53rd qualifier from Qualifyting Tournament, Money List 61-100
tourBios.carHigh: 2011: Is a rookie on the 2012 Web.com Tour. Has never played in a PGA TOUR event.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: First-team All-Southeastern Conference in 2007 and Academic All-SEC in 2008.
tourBios.personal: List Todd Anderson and Randy Myers as instructors...Says winning the 2008 SEC Championship is his biggest thrill in golf. Cites Alabama's 2008 NCAA Championship in football is his biggest thrill outside of golf...Favorite course he's played is Augusta National and would like to play Cypress Point...Always marks his ball with a 1963 quarter...Never travels without a Bible...Favorite websites include rolltide.com and espn.com...Favorite teams are the Alabama Crimson Tide and the New York Jets...Favorite TV shows are "Boardwalk Empire" and "Entourage," and "Top Gun" is his favorite movie...Favorite group is The Black Keys...Favorite athletes to watch are Michael Jordan, Aaron Rodgers and Tom Watson...Favorite cities to visit are New York and Tuscaloosa, and he enjoys vacationing in Fort Lauderdale and Gulf Shores in Florida...Twitter account is @gtodd23...Favorite app is Pandora...Favorite gadget is his iPhone...Would put his dad, brother and Watson in his dream foursome...His father, Richard, played quarterback at the University of Alabama and the New York Jets (1975-86)...Has one sister and one brother...Played three years of basketball in high school...Worked as a broker as a research analyst for six months after graduating from college and then turned professional...Favorite motto is "Limits, like fears, are often just an illusion."...Says he got his nickname when he was an infant because he used to bite people...Charity work included the Richard Todd Classic, which benefits cancer research.

dyn.dynStats: He ranks T27th in Par or Better - Current Streak on the Web.com Tour.
